Summary: above trees came into sight hovered then shot up and away and disapeared
divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and 3 other friends were driving down a dark road, we were the only car in sight on March 14 2012 between 9:33pm and 9:34pm. the low flying object was a white blue light that was so bright it caught everyone in the cars attention at once, it hovered for a split second and then zoomed off and disappeared. We were located between Grantline elementary school and Indiana university southeast in New Albany Indiana driving towards IUS.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in New Albany
There were no other sightings in New Albany on or around March 14th 2012
